flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to replace 30*10=<<30*10=3000>>3000 ball bearings
The normal price is 3000*1=$<<3000*1=3000>>3000
Because of the sale he only has to pay 3000*0.75=$<<3000*0.75=2250>>2250
He then gets a discount which shaves another 2250*0.2=$<<2250*0.2=450>>450 off the price
That means he only pays 2250-450=$<<2250-450=1800>>1800
So he saved 3000-1800=$<<3000-1800=1200>>1200
#### 1200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
